Reviews.Title: A Good P&S; Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Paradise
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a birthday present a couple years back.  The camera is a nice little camera to take anywhere with you.  I have used this camera every single day for the past couple of years and I have not had any trouble with it yet.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!!!
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Cormier "snoopdog"
Reviews.Content: I was so happy when I received my Kodak EasyShare camera!!!  I had the same camera for years and when it broke was thrilled I could find a replacement.  The camera arrived promptly and the seller included a scan card with it!!!  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: A little trooper
Reviews.Author: LilFlower2003
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for years, and its still wonderful. Takes great pictures, easy to use, and I've dropped it about a million times and its still just fine. Tried & True!

Reviews.Title: The phone would not charge!
Reviews.Author: L. Douglas "-Lloyd"
Reviews.Content: The phone would not charge. Not only that but i also was under the impression that i was receiving a silver camera but it was red.

ProductInfo.Features:
Kodak EasyShare MD853 8.2MP 3x Opt/5x Digital Zoom Camera General Features: Silver color
8.2 megapixel effective pixels (3312 x 2488) 8.3 MP CCD total pixels (3320 x 2496) 1/2.5 CCD sensor
16 MB internal memory (expandable via SD/MMC card) USB interface 3x optical zoom 5x digital zoom
37-111 mm (35 mm equivalent) lens; f2.8-f/5.2 Mechanical shutter and ND4 filter
4-1/1400 second shutter speed
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare Digital Camera MD853 8.2MP 3X Optical Zoom
